Package core.dynamicproxy

Class DynamicProxy

java.lang.Object
core.dynamicproxy.DynamicProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
InvocationHandler
public class DynamicProxy extends Object implements InvocationHandler
A dynamic proxy class that implements the InvocationHandler interface. It allows the creation of proxy instances for objects and handles method invocations on those objects.
See Also:
  • InvocationHandler

  • Method Details

    • instantiate

      public static Object instantiate(Object target, boolean isSync)
      Creates a proxy instance for the specified target object with the given synchronization flag.
      Parameters:
      target - the target object for which a proxy is to be created
      isSync - a boolean flag indicating whether the proxy should operate in a synchronous manner
      Returns:
      a proxy instance for the target object

    • invoke

      public Object invoke(Object proxy, Method method, Object[] args) throws Exception
      Handles method invocations on the proxy object.
      Specified by:
      invoke in interface InvocationHandler
      Parameters:
      proxy - the proxy object
      method - the method being invoked
      args - the arguments passed to the method
      Returns:
      the result of the method invocation
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during method invocation

    • getActionProxy

      public static Object getActionProxy(String id, boolean isSync) throws OperationNotValid, NoActionRegistered
      Gets the proxy for a specified action based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the action
      isSync - a boolean flag indicating whether the action should operate in a synchronous manner
      Returns:
      a proxy for the specified ID action
      Throws:
      OperationNotValid - if the ID is null
      NoActionRegistered - if no action is registered with the specified ID
